AltName.entry: SEVENHILLS TAEKWONDO AND MUDO ACADEMY - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: Taekwondo class for adults and children aged 6 years and over. Beginners welcome. Gradings held every 3 months. 5th Dan instructor under the guidance of Master Kim Yoong Ho, 9th Dan. Available for summer fairs and demonstrations or exhibitions. National Dan gradings. Takes part in national and international competitions.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
